title: North America Innovative Lawyers Awards 2022: the winners
text:
We are pleased to reveal the winners of the FT Innovative Lawyer North America Awards 2022, celebrating innovation in the legal industry. The awards event took place online on December 5, hosted by FT Live in association with research partner RSGI.

There are three strands: individuals, law firms and in-house legal teams.

Individuals

Most Innovative Leader

Richard Trobman, Latham & Watkins

Most Innovative Practitioner

Lisa Ellman, Hogan Lovells

Katherine Lowry, BakerHostetler
